name: Formula 1 Racer
overview: “Race against the clock in this test of quick reactions and steady nerves. You drive your Formula 1 Racer around a twisting course, swerving to avoid other racers and – WATCH OUT! – round signs. As your shift into overdrive your speed increases, and you cover more miles and earn more points. But you may have to downshift quickly as you enter a sharp curve at dangerous speeds. As your skill improves, you can advance from noice to intermediate – and then to expert!”
